metaData.label: Не зарегистрированные
metaData.criteriaDescription: reg is False OR reg is null

criteria.default_path_1: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="OR" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.DEAudience-c5781fd0-0ba8-ac5a-2444-743ea5db2cc9.reg" Operator="Is" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[false]]></Value></Condition><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.DEAudience-c5781fd0-0ba8-ac5a-2444-743ea5db2cc9.reg" Operator="IsNull" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>

metaData.label: Ревматологи
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Rheumatology OR SPECIALTY_2 equal Rheumatology

metaData.label: Гастроэнтерологи, Колопроктологи
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Gastroenterology OR SPECIALTY_2 equal Gastroenterology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Coloproctology OR SPECIALTY_2 equal Coloproctology

metaData.label: Педиатры
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatrics OR SPECIALTY_2 equal Paediatrics OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Rheumatology OR SPECIALTY_2 equal Pediatric Rheumatology
